form.label: PowerShell
form.description: Scripts from the "legit_powershell_scripts.csv" lookup are excluded. To view the content of the lookup check the "view lookup content" checkbox, hit submit and scroll down.

search.query: | makeresults | `ps_suspicious_command` | mvexpand suspicious_command_desc | fields - _time suspicious_command | sort suspicious_command_desc

index=$indexSelect$ `security_log` EventCode=4688 host="$hostText$" (src_user="$userText$" OR user="$userText$") process_parameters=* (process_exe="powershell*" OR process_command="powershell*") process_command!=*splunk* NOT [ | inputlookup legit_powershell_scripts.csv | eval system_group=split(system_group, "|") | where system_group="$system_group$" | fields script_file ] | eval process_length=len(process_parameters), powershell_options_snipped=if(len(process_parameters)<130, process_parameters, substr(process_parameters,0,130)." ****SNIP**** "), powershell_script=coalesce(script_file, remote_script, ""), earliest=strftime(_time,"%s"), latest=tonumber(strftime(_time, "%s"))+0.001, earliest_min_xd=tonumber(earliest-(86400*7)) | `ps_suspicious_command($maxLengthText$,$perc_AN$)` | search $suspiciousCommandSelect$ | sort - _time | table _time host src_user user process_exe powershell_script powershell_options_snipped suspicious_command earliest earliest_min_xd latest process_parameters perc_non_AN process_length Creator_Process_ID New_Process_ID | rename host AS Host, src_user AS "Source User", user AS "Target User", process_exe AS "Process EXE", powershell_script AS "Script file", powershell_options_snipped AS "Powershell options", suspicious_command AS "Suspicious (reason)", perc_non_AN AS "% Non alphanumeric", process_length AS Length

table.fields: ["_time","Host","Source User","Target User","Process EXE","Script file","Powershell options","Suspicious (reason)","% Non alphanumeric","Length"]

panel.title: Parent Process & Full Process Command Line

search.query: index=$indexSelect$ `security_log` EventCode=4688 process_command!=*splunk* earliest=$script_earliest$ latest=$script_latest$ host="$script_host$" user="$script_user$" New_Process_ID="$script_process_id$" | append [| search index=$indexSelect$ `security_log` EventCode=4688 host="$script_host$" New_Process_ID="$script_process_creator_id$" earliest=$script_earliest_min_xd$ latest=$script_latest$ | eval isParent="yes"] | eval parentProcess=if(isParent=="yes",New_Process_Name, null()) | stats values(parentProcess*) AS parentProcess* by Process_Command_Line New_Process_ID | reverse | autoregress parentProcess | eval parentProcess=coalesce(parentProcess,parentProcess_p1) | where New_Process_ID=="$script_process_id$" | table parentProcess Process_Command_Line

| inputlookup legit_powershell_scripts.csv | eval system_group=split(system_group,"|"), search_group=if("$indexSelect$"=="wineventlog-wp", "workstations","servers") | where system_group=search_group | table script_file, script_location, options, hash_type, hash, system_group
